text: The suborder Suina (also known Suiformes) contains perhaps the earliest and most archaic even-toed ungulates. == Classification == This suborden Suina includes family Suidae (pigs, hogs) and the family Tayassuidae (peccaries). Older morphogical studies also identified family Hippopotamidae (hippos) among the Suina. ==Related pages== * Cetartiodactyla Category:Even-toed ungulates
title: Suina
